a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD5DTBCGContraindicationsLogic (IMMZ.D5.DT.BCG contraindications) * Rule: Check for contraindications before administering the vaccine(s) due * Decision Table: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCG contraindications * Trigger: IMMZ.D5 Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications */ library IMMZD5DTBCGContraindicationsLogic

def.name: Draft Medication Request ID for BCG dose

a:t.name: dynamicValue
a:t.value: Draft Medication Request ID for BCG dose

source.name: Draft Medication Request for BCG dose

def.name: Bacille Calmette–Guérin (BCG) vaccination is contraindicated Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Bacille Calmette–Guérin (BCG) vaccination is contraindicated Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Do not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is not recommended during pregnancy

a:s.a:s: 'Do not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is not recommended during pregnancy'

expression.value: Do not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is not recommended during pregnancy

a:t.value: BCG vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note. Case 1

a:s.a:s: "The client has history of severe allergic reactions"

a:t.value: BCG vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note. Case 2

a:s.a:s: "The client is exposed to immunosuppressive treatment"
"Client's age is more than or equal to 1 year"

a:s.a:s: "BCG vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note. Case 1"
'Do not vaccinate client with BCG if the client had previous allergic reaction to any component of the vaccine'
"BCG vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note. Case 2"
'Do not vaccinate client with BCG if client is exposed to or receives immunosuppressive treatment'

when.name: BCG vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note. Case 1

then.value: Do not vaccinate client with BCG if the client had previous allergic reaction to any component of the vaccine

when.name: BCG vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note. Case 2

then.value: Do not vaccinate client with BCG if client is exposed to or receives immunosuppressive treatment

Client's age is less than 1 year

then.value: Do not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is contraindicated for clients with immunodeficiency syndromes
Do not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is contraindicated for clients undergoing immunosuppressive treatment
